snippet: Sybrina Fulton and Tracy Martin met with publishers this week to discuss a book they intend to write about their son and his fatal shooting.
abstract: Sybrina Fulton and Tracy Martin, parents of Trayvon Martin, meet with publishers to discuss a book they intend to write about their son and his fatal shooting.
lead_paragraph: Sybrina Fulton and Tracy Martin met with publishers this week to discuss a book they intend to write about their son and his fatal shooting.

headline.main: Trayvon Martin’s Parents Are Planning a Book
headline.print_headline: Trayvon Martin’s Parents Plan to Write a Book
